name: kuvasz
description: Kuvasz is an uptime monitoring and incident notification service. It regularly checks endpoints, records availability metrics and sends alerts when services go down, providing a central dashboard for small to medium infrastructures.

features.title: Uptime Monitoring
features.description: Regular health checks for endpoints with availability tracking. Monitor service uptime continuously

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Measure and graph response times for performance monitoring. Identify slow services

features.title: Incident Detection
features.description: Automatic downtime detection with incident creation. Know when services fail

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Email and webhook notifications for downtime events. Get notified immediately

features.title: Escalation Policies
features.description: Configure alert escalation for critical services. Ensure issues are addressed

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Central view of all monitored services and their status. Track infrastructure health

features.title: Historical Data
features.description: View uptime history and incident reports over time. Analyze reliability trends

features.title: Ssl Monitoring
features.description: Check SSL certificate validity and expiration dates. Prevent certificate issues
